oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Partially completed gravesite of Harold Adkins
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Partially completed gravesite of Harold Adkins. Harold was killed after an accident in which he was dragged behind a horse. He was 14 years old at the time that he died. He is buried in Greenwood Cemetery. On verso, "Harold Adkins grave".
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Funeral service
